item.description:
Facing a relationship, job/business, health, or financial challenge? Want to increase the flow of abundance & have more contentment in your life? Interested in more consciously participating in the shift of consciousness appearing around the globe?

The Four Agreements by international bestselling author, don Miguel Ruiz, has inspired millions around the world to transform their lives & attract true happiness, freedom, & love.

Meghan McChesney Gilroy, Master Spiritual Teacher & Transformative Life Coach, who had studied with Ruiz, will:
-- introduce a new twist on The Four Agreements & how they can support manifesting your heart's desires

-- bring insight into how the newly released Fifth Agreement helps you bust limiting beliefs

-- facilitate an engaging, experiential exercise that demonstrates the power of emotion

-- offer mini-coaching sessions to participants facing real-life challenges &

-- guide the group into a deep meditation that connects YOU to experiencing the power of your heart

In addition, Meghan will provide a bonus audio meditation offer & free introductory coaching sessions to a limited number of participants.

***************************************************************
About Meghan McChesney Gilroy:
www.lifemasteryprograms.com
email: Meghan@LifeMasteryPrograms.com
Marblehead, MA

Meghan experienced her first spiritual awakening at the age of 26. While personally studying with don Miguel Ruiz, international bestselling author of "The Four Agreements", & serving as the Executive Director of his non-profit foundation, he recognized Meghan as “a spiritual leader for the next generation.”

Meghan is a gifted spiritual teacher & transformational life coach who inspires her students to connect to their hearts, overcome limiting beliefs & challenges, & create fulfilling lives. Through her successful teaching & life coaching practice, she assists individuals & couples in releasing old thoughts & emotions, improving relationships, increasing abundance, & becoming more mindful parents. 

She offers private appointments, teleclasses, seminars & journeys around the US & in Mexico & is a host on the Body, Mind, & Spirit TV Show.

***************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

**************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1)Go here: http://www.meetup.com...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: How to Use The Four (& 5th) Agreements to Attract Your Heart's Desires
